text: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

translation.en: Said those who were arrogant, "Indeed we, in that which you have believed, are disbelievers
translation.id: Orang-orang yang menyombongkan diri berkata, "Sesungguhnya kami mengingkari apa yang kamu percayai
